titles.title: A resolution notifying the House of Representatives of the election of a Sergeant at Arms and Doorkeeper of the Senate.
A resolution notifying the House of Representatives of the election of a Sergeant at Arms and Doorkeeper of the Senate.

vote.text: Submitted in the Senate, considered, and agreed to without amendment by Unanimous Consent.

bill.summary:
(This measure has not been amended since it was introduced. The summary of that version is repeated here.)
Notifies the House of Representatives of the election of the Honorable Frank J. Larkin as Sergeant at Arms and Doorkeeper of the Senate.
